resources.string: Aiuta a migliorare la MIUI inviando dati di utilizzo anonimi
Hide messages, notes, pictures, and incoming calls
Require a password to disable Guest mode
Sign in to your Mi Account to reset password
Make the screen extra responsive to pressure
Turn off prevent pocket dials as well?
Lock tablet automatically when it\'s placed in a bag
Lock phone automatically when it\'s placed in a pocket
Replacing your default %1$s may increase power consumption, reduce speed, and can put tablet contents at risk. Use %2$s instead.
Replacing your default %1$s may increase power consumption, reduce speed, and can put phone contents at risk. Use %2$s instead.
Using \"%1$s\" as your default messaging app may increase data usage or compromise the security of your data.
This app will be set as your default app for reading and composing text messages.
Long press Back to take photo
Pressing Volume buttons wakes the device
Go to directly to Home screen or password input from wake
Go directly to Home screen from wake
Your tablet will stop connecting to this network automatically.
Your phone will stop connecting to this network automatically.
LED color when receiving new notification
Pulse when you have new notifications
Set the interval between LED flashes
Pulse notification light when new notification is received
Menu, Home and Back key indicator
Wi-Fi was disconnected due to poor connection
Another Wi-Fi session was detected. Wait a minute or two and try again.
The network password you entered is incorrect.
A directory with that name already exists.
SD card does not have an AS certificate.
Frequently used items will be listed here
%1$sThis keyboard can record everything you type, including passwords, credit card numbers, and other personal data.
Show apps that have been force-closed
Erase all data from your tablet\'s internal storage
Erase all data from your phone\'s internal storage
Erase your Mi Account info, app data, and system settings
Erase all your personal information? You can\'t reverse this action!
Erase your personal information and downloaded apps? You can\'t reverse this action!
Erase your personal info and content? You can\'t reverse this action!
Erase all data from your tablet\'s internal storage? You can\'t reverse this action!
Erase all data from your phone\'s internal storage? You can\'t reverse this action!
Erase music, photos, videos, and other user data
Transfer files via Windows or OSX
Get drivers for Windows and OSX
Music, video, games, and other media
Camera shutter, lock screen, and other system notifications
All volume levels will be reset.
Change the operating system\'s font size
Selecting more than one set of definitions will slow down installation and scanning
Only use definitions from a trusted source.
You\'re already using the latest definitions
The scan may take longer. You\’re using more than one set of definitions.
"Surround sound settings only available for headphones"
"You can only use the EQ in Dolby music mode. Enable it now?"
You can only use Wi-Fi Display when Wi-Fi is enabled. Enable it now?
If you stop the Wi-Fi display session, your connection to %1$s will be terminated.
If you stop the Wi-Fi display session, your connection to %1$s and %2$s other devices will be terminated.
Looks like you\'re running a benchmark test. Set power management to \"Performance\" for best results.
Can\'t connect to your device?\nSelect your operating system:
After you install the driver\n%1$s will appear as a USB storage device when connected to a computer.
For Windows Vista and newer, %1$s will appear as a USB storage device when connected to a computer.
If your computer still doesn\'t detect the device, try the following:
Install Android File Transfer first, then run the software.
Windows: Download Mi Phone Manager to use your phone as a USB storage device.
OSX: Download the driver and install AndroidFileTransfer.dmg.
This name will be visible to other Bluetooth devices nearby.
Driving now... I\'ll call you later
Use this app for some operations by default
Manage autostart, root access, and other app permissions
Enabling %1$s\'s floating window settings requires the app to restart. You can also stop running the app manually.\nEnable floating windows?
Disabling %1$s\'s floating window settings will stop the app.\nDisable floating windows?
Make sure the router supports and has enabled WPS
To reset your password, sign in to your Mi Account
To reset your password, sign in to your Mi Account
Let apps use data from Wi-Fi and mobile networks to estimate your location
You don\'t have any dictionaries\nAdd a word by touching the Add (+) button
"Change or disable pattern, PIN, or password"
You need to set a lock screen PIN or password before you can use credential storage.\"
App has started running service. Stopping may cause errors.
Erase internal storage? You can\'t reverse this action! Tablet will restart after internal storage is erased.
Erase internal storage? You can\'t reverse this action! Phone will restart after internal storage is erased.
Erase internal storage? All of your data will be deleted. Tablet will restart after internal storage is erased.
Erase internal storage? All of your data will be deleted. Phone will restart after internal storage is erased.
Erase all data on your internal storage
Creating bug report (takes about a minute)
Start to dump modem\'s log to %s
Stop to dump modem\'s log from %s
Set priority for each access point manually
Tap to set priority for each access point
Allow data exchange when the tablet touches another device
Allow data exchange when the phone touches another device
NFC content sharing requires that NFC is enabled
You can beam a web page, a video, or other content from your screen to another device, by touching the devices together (typically back to back).
Make sure the two devices are touching, and then touch the content you want to beam.
Capture all Bluetooth HCI packets in a file
MIUI users can share public Wi-Fi networks (cafes, restaurants, hotels, etc.) with one another.
"When another MIUI user shares a network, you can connect directly without using a password."
Give back by sharing your public Wi-Fi networks with other MIUI users.
MIUI has connected you to a public Wi-Fi network.
When you share your public networks,\n you can use other users\' networks too
If this is a public network, you can share it with other MIUI users.
You\'re connected to a public Wi-Fi network that has been shared by another user
To share, sign in to your Mi Account
To share, scan the QR code above.
Use simplified Home screen and menus
Your phone will reboot to enter Lite mode.
3D Stereoscopic output to external 3D display enabled
3D Stereoscopic output to external 3D display disabled
For using game controllers and other peripherals on USB port, may decrease battery life
Using secure element on SIM card
"Can't connect to the network. Check your data connection and try again."
"Can't sign in. Wait a minute or two and try again."
Notify me when a Mi Router is available
Apps running in the background can’t receive messages
Apps can\'t connect to network if background data is restricted
Manage Wi-Fi, Bluetooth, Airplane mode, Mobile networks, & VPNs
Wireless display is disabled because Wi-Fi is off
Don\'t use a Wi-Fi network unless it has a good connection
Minimize battery usage when Wi-Fi is on
To see available networks, turn Wi-Fi on
You don\'t have permission to change the Wi-Fi network.
To complete setup, your device needs access to Wi-Fi. After setup, you can switch between mobile data and Wi-Fi.
Press the Wi-Fi Protected Setup button on your router. It may be called \"WPS\" or contain this symbol:
Enter pin %1$s on your Wi-Fi router. The setup can take up to two minutes to complete.
Turn off Wi-Fi when not using it or when it isn\'t available
Back up app data, Wi-Fi passwords, and other settings to Google servers
Stop backing up your Wi-Fi passwords, bookmarks, other settings, and app data, and erase all copies on Google servers?
You can\'t configure an EAP Wi-Fi connection during setup. After setup, you can go to Settings > Wireless & networks.
Touch Next to continue with setup.\n\nTouch Back to connect to a different Wi-Fi network.
If you restrict background mobile data, some apps and services won\'t work unless you\'re connected to a Wi-Fi network.
If you restrict background mobile data, some apps and services won\'t work properly unless you\'re connected to a Wi-Fi network.
If you restrict background mobile data, some apps and services won\'t work properly unless you\'re connected to a Wi-Fi network.
Indicate which Wi-Fi networks are portable hotspots. Apps can be restricted from using these networks in the background. Apps will also notify you before using these networks for large downloads.
To select hotspots, turn Wi-Fi on.

You can share this device with other people by creating additional users. Each user has their own space, which they can customize with their own apps, wallpaper, and so on. Users can also adjust tablet settings like Wi-Fi that affect everyone.

After you create a new user, that person needs to go through a setup process.

Any user can accept updated app permissions on behalf of all users.
Allow modification of Wi-Fi and Mobile settings
Screensaver begins 5 seconds after display turns off
Displaying screensaver will consume additional battery power.
Sign in to your Mi Account
Default app preferences will be restored to MIUI presets.
You\'re running the latest version of MIUI
You\'re running the latest version of MIUI
No updates were found for your tablet
No updates were found for your phone
Relax, we\'ll let you know if there\'s an update :)
Sign in to your Mi Account
Sign in to your Mi Account to update?
Sign in to your Mi Account
